Contagion on Complex Social Systems (CCSS) 2023 is an interdisciplinary workshop gathering world leaders and young researchers in topics related to modeling of contagion in social systems in order to promote and cross-fertilize various computational and modeling approaches. We encourage researchers from all career stages to apply, particularly young researchers.

# Details
When: August 14-16, 2023

Location: University of Vermont (Workshop will take place in the first floor of Stafford Hall)

Type: Single track

Tentative daily schedule: Morning session 9-12, lunch 12-2, Afternoon session 2-5

# Funding

Travel funding of up to $1,300 will be available for US-based, non-local participants while funds last. We will start reviewing applications June 9th on a rolling basis.
